item.title: Syntax Highlighting in Hwaro
item.description:
Hwaro supports syntax highlighting out of the box via Highlight.js. Here are some examples.

Crystal

class Greeter
  def initialize(@name : String)
  end

  def greet
    puts "Hello, #{@name}!"
  end
end

Greeter.new("World").greet

JavaScript

const fibonacci = (n) => {
  if (n <= 1) return n;
  return fibonacci(n - 1) + fibonacci(n - 2);
};

console.log(fibonacci(10)); // 55

HTML + Jinja2

{% for post in section.pages %}
  <article>
    <h2>{{ post.title }}</h2>
    <p>{{ post.summary }}</p>
  </article>
{% endfor %}

The theme is configured in config.toml under [highlight]. Try changing it to monokai or atom-one-dark for a different look.
